blogPost.excerpt: This is a website with alcohol education and solutions, in partnership with over two dozen other independent brands who are working to raise the standards of the alcohol industry.
blogPost.body: This is a website with alcohol education and solutions, in partnership with over two dozen other independent brands who are working to raise the standards of the alcohol industry.
blogPost.title: Know Your Alcohol  - Demystifying the alcohol industry (from Haus and Good Vodka)
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 这是一个提供酒精教育和解决方案的网站，与其他二十多个独立品牌合作，他们正在努力提高酒精行业的标准。
localize.tagline: 解读酒类行业（摘自豪斯和好伏特加）。

localize.description: 這是一個提供酒精教育和解決方案的網站，與其他二十多個獨立品牌合作，他們正在努力提高酒精行業的標準。
localize.tagline: 解讀酒類行業（摘自豪斯和好伏特加）。

previous.excerpt: Plot combines your calendar, health and finances to give you a personalized overview of your life so you can manage what’s important. By integrating with your Apple Calendar and Health apps with your finances, Plot pulls-in and organizes your information.
previous.title: Plot 2.0 - a calendar, health and personal finance app all in one

localize.description: Plot结合了你的日历、健康和财务，给你一个个性化的生活概览，让你可以管理重要的事情。通过整合你的Apple日历和健康应用程序与你的财务状况，Plot将你的信息拉进并组织起来。
localize.tagline: 一款集日历、健康和个人理财于一身的应用。

localize.description: Plot結合了你的日曆、健康和財務，給你一個個性化的生活概覽，讓你可以管理重要的事情。通過整合你的Apple日曆和健康應用程序與你的財務狀況，Plot將你的信息拉進並組織起來。
localize.tagline: 一款集日曆、健康和個人理財於一身的應用。
